page.title: 15Policing Amberley Rackham
page.content: Crime Alert Scheme is a neighbourhood watch scheme organised by the Sussex Police. Residents report any suspicious incident to their police contact or in an emergency a 999 emergency call suffices. Window stickers are provided for those participationg in the scheme showing the home is under serveillance. Some minor vandelism occurs occasionally but no serious disorders. There are no yellow lines, restrictions or Car Parks. Parked vehicles often cause congestion on the narrow Rackham road. There are no street lights or pavements. There are no speed limits but on the whole drivers are careful and very few accidents occur. Fortunately a law abiding village!
